channel.title: Weekly Events?
channel.description:
I really don't get why we haven't had any kind of weekly event thing, so I decided to try organizing them. However, I'd need to know what we all want to do first :| Things I can think of are:
Boss Hunting Revenants Lootshare based monster hunting (TzHaar, Revs, Chaos Dwarf Cannoneers, etc) Minigames Group Skilling
So what do you guys want to do? Post here for ideas, and I'll post an official topic later today I guess. Just keep in mind that all LS events will be in the friend chat [b]mscpls[/b].

item.title: Weekly Events?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Ok, thanks

EDIT: I’ll be posting a drop log for Chaos Dwarf Hand Cannoneers just to get an idea of the rates. I’ll try to update the list every 100 kills or whenever I log out.

item.title: Weekly Events?
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

i cant wait for the first event. If you need help organising anything PM meand i’ll give you a hand.

Read full topic

item.title: Weekly Events?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I’VE DECIDED.

First large group event should be cannoning at the Chaos Dwarf battlefield, then we all see who can mine the most ore from the mine So we can all be happy.

Read full topic

item.title: Weekly Events?
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

I’d go if I was on to pretty much any event involving money being made.

Read full topic

item.title: Weekly Events?
item.dc:creator: @Immortal_Technique Immortal Technique
item.description:
@Immortal_Technique wrote:

When I get my account back I’d lije to go to Cannoneers, I get pretty lucky there.

Read full topic

item.title: Weekly Events?
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

i would come to any event, preferably skilling but anything will do. this is good idea, i’m not sure why it hasn’t been done yet.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

I’d only come for boss hunting

item.title: Weekly Events?

item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Support. Group Skilling would be nice, and minigames. I’m not much of a fighter.

Read full topic

item.title: Weekly Events?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I really don’t get why we haven’t had any kind of weekly event thing, so I decided to try organizing them. However, I’d need to know what we all want to do first Things I can think of are:

Boss Hunting
Revenants
Lootshare based monster hunting (TzHaar, Revs, Chaos Dwarf Cannoneers, etc)
Minigames
Group Skilling

So what do you guys want to do? Post here for ideas, and I’ll post an official topic later today I guess. Just keep in mind that all LS events will be in the friend chat mscpls.

Read full topic
